title: 2010–11 Sunderland A.F.C. season
text: During the <a href="2010%E2%80%9311%20in%20English%20football">2010–11</a> season, <a href="Sunderland%20A.F.C.">Sunderland A.F.C.</a> (the professional association football club representing the aforementioned <a href="Sunderland%2C%20Tyne%20and%20Wear">city</a>) competed in the <a href="Premier%20League">Premier League</a>.
